Entity - Class in exengine.datamodel
The Entity class represents a Home Assistant entity in a smart home system.

Repository interface for accessing and managing Entity (Home Assistant entities) in the MongoDB database.
equals(Object) - Method in class exengine.datamodel.LogEntry
Two LogEntry objects are equal if at least their entityId and state matches.

ExplainableEngineApplication - Class in exengine
ExplainableEngineApplication: A prototype of the SmartEx reference architecture for generating user-centric explanations in smart environments (Here: the smart home managing system "Home Assistant").
ExplainableEngineApplication() - Constructor for class exengine.ExplainableEngineApplication
 
ExplanationContextMappingService - Class in exengine.contextexplanationgenerator
Component to perform the mapping of context to most appropriate view type, according to mapping policies described in the paper and defined in the packages .ruleBookForRules and .ruleBookForErrors.
